TriggerGroup.name: get info - curesets, classlist, tree scenarios

Trigger.name: no tree scenarios
Trigger.script: if ar.install.installed == false then ar.treeScenarios = {} raiseEvent("ar.gotTreeScenarios") end

regexCodeList.string: You have defined no tree scenarios.

Trigger.name: no curesets
Trigger.script: if ar.install.installed == false then ar.curesetList = {} raiseEvent("ar.gotCuresets") end

regexCodeList.string: You have no sets defined - you are currently using default priorities.

Trigger.name: class list end
Trigger.script: for level in string.gmatch(ars.myInfo.level, "(%d+).*") do level = tonumber(level) if level > 100 then table.insert(t, "dragon") end end if ar.install.installed == false then ar.classList = table.deepcopy(t) raiseEvent("ar.gotClassList") end ars.myClasses = table.deepcopy(t) t = nil table.save(ars.file .. "/class list", ars.myClasses) setTriggerStayOpen("get classes", 0)

Trigger.name: cureset list end
Trigger.script:
if ar.install.installed == false then ar.curesetList = table.deepcopy(t)
raiseEvent("ar.gotCuresets") end t = nil setTriggerStayOpen("get curesets", 0)

Trigger.name: tree scenarios end
Trigger.script: if ar.install.installed == false then ar.treeScenarios = table.deepcopy(t) raiseEvent("ar.gotTreeScenarios") cecho("got tree scenarios") end t = nil setTriggerStayOpen("get tree scenarios", 0)

regexCodeList.string: You are already viewing advanced curing options.
You already have the KILL warning activated.
You have set your screen width to 0, which should disable wrapping completely.
Universal affliction messages are already disabled.
Will now show when actions are added to your balance queues.
You will now see advanced curing options under the CURING COMMAND.
You have activated the KILL warning.
You will no longer see universal affliction messages.
You can set a separator to be able to send multiple commands to Achaea at once.
^You have set the '\S+' affliction to the \d+ priority\.$
^The '\S+' affliction doesn't have a command-based cure, skipping priority setting\.$
All your defence priorities have been reset to defaults.

Alias.name: install
Alias.script: if not matches[2] then cecho( "\n<red>::::<yellow>WARNING<red>:::: <white> Will run installation, resetting all curing options. Please type 'ar install confirm' to confirm installation" ) else enableTrigger("ar installation - DO NOT UNLOCK") for k, v in pairs(ar.install.progress) do ar.install.progress[k] = false end ar.install.installed = false raiseEvent("ar.install.startInstall") end

ScriptGroup.name: AR family
ScriptGroup.script: ar = ar or {} ar.file = getMudletHomeDir() .. "/AR system" if not lfs.attributes(ar.file) then lfs.mkdir(ar.file) end sendGMCP([[Core.Supports.Add ["Comm.Channel 1", "IRE.Target 1", "IRE.Rift 1"] ]])

Script.name: affliction list by cures

ScriptGroup.name: skills

Script.name: skills lists
Script.script: ar.skills.byClass = { alchemist = {[1] = {"alchemy"}, [2] = {"physiology"}, [3] = {"sublimation", "formulation"}}, apostate = {[1] = {"evileye"}, [2] = {"necromancy"}, [3] = {"apostasy"}}, bard = {[1] = {"voicecraft"}, [2] = {"swashbuckling"}, [3] = {"harmonics"}}, blademaster = {[1] = {"twoarts"}, [2] = {"striking"}, [3] = {"shindo"}}, depthswalker = {[1] = {"aeonics"}, [2] = {"shadowmancy"}, [3] = {"terminus"}}, druid = {[1] = {"groves"}, [2] = {"metamorphosis"}, [3] = {"reclamation"}}, infernal = {[1] = {"weaponmastery"}, [2] = {"oppression"}, [3] = {"chivalry"}}, jester = {[1] = {"tarot"}, [2] = {"pranks"}, [3] = {"puppetry"}}, magi = {[1] = {"elementalism"}, [2] = {"crystalism"}, [3] = {"artificing"}}, monk = {[1] = {"tekura", "shikudo"}, [2] = {"kaido"}, [3] = {"telepathy"}}, occultist = {[1] = {"occultism"}, [2] = {"tarot"}, [3] = {"domination"}}, paladin = {[1] = {"weaponmastery"}, [2] = {"devotion"}, [3] = {"chivalry"}}, priest = {[1] = {"spiritualtiy"}, [2] = {"devotion"}, [3] = {"zeal"}}, psion = {[1] = {"weaving"}, [2] = {"psionics"}, [3] = {"emulation"}}, runewarden = {[1] = {"weaponmastery"}, [2] = {"runelore"}, [3] = {"chivalry"}}, sentinel = {[1] = {"metamorphosis"}, [2] = {"runelore"}, [3] = {"skirmishing"}}, serpent = {[1] = {"subterfuge"}, [2] = {"venom"}, [3] = {"hypnosis"}}, shaman = {[1] = {"spiritlore"}, [2] = {"curses"}, [3] = {"vodun"}}, sylvan = {[1] = {"propagation"}, [2] = {"groves"}, [3] = {"weatherweaving"}}, } ar.skills.misc = {"vision", "survival", "tattoos", "weaponry", "riding", "seafaring", "attainment"}

Script.name: get skill groups
Script.script: ar.skills.iHave = function() local dontCare = { "Philosophy", "Galvanism", "Fitness", "Antidotes", "Frost", "Thermology", "Constitution", "Avoidance", } for i = 1, #gmcp.Char.Skills.Groups do if table.contains(dontCare, gmcp.Char.Skills.Groups[i].name) == false then ar.mySkills[gmcp.Char.Skills.Groups[i].name:lower()] = ar.mySkills[gmcp.Char.Skills.Groups[i].name:lower()] or {} end end raiseEvent("ar.gotSkillGroups") end

Script.name: event handlers
Script.script: ar.skills.getSkills = function(event) if event == "gmcp.Char.Skills.List" then for _, v in pairs(gmcp.Char.Skills.List.list) do ar.mySkills[gmcp.Char.Skills.List.group][v:lower()] = 0 sendGMCP( "Char.Skills.Get " .. yajl.to_string({group = gmcp.Char.Skills.List.group, name = v}) ) end raiseEvent("ar.gotSkillGroups") end if event == "ar.gotSkillGroups" then for k, _ in pairs(ar.mySkills) do if table.is_empty(ar.mySkills[k]) == true then sendGMCP("Char.Skills.Get " .. yajl.to_string({group = k})) send(" ") break end end end if event == "gmcp.Char.Skills.Info" then if string.find(gmcp.Char.Skills.Info.info, "*** You have not yet learned this ability **") then ar.mySkills[gmcp.Char.Skills.Info.group][gmcp.Char.Skills.Info.skill] = false else ar.mySkills[gmcp.Char.Skills.Info.group][gmcp.Char.Skills.Info.skill] = true end end table.save(ar.file .. "/skill list", ar.mySkills) end registerAnonymousEventHandler("gmcp.Char.Skills.List", "ar.skills.getSkills") registerAnonymousEventHandler("ar.gotSkillGroups", "ar.skills.getSkills") registerAnonymousEventHandler("gmcp.Char.Skills.Info", "ar.skills.getSkills")

ScriptGroup.name: installation
ScriptGroup.script:
ar.install = ar.install or {} if not lfs.attributes(ar.file .. "/installation") then lfs.mkdir(ar.file .. "/installation") end if io.exists(ar.file .. "/installation/installTable") then table.load(ar.file .. "/installation/installTable", ar.install) end ar.install.installed = ar.install.installed or false
ar.install.progress = ar.install.progress or {installedEcho = false, curesets = false, treescenarios = false, deletepriorsettings = false}

Script.name: delete prior settings and install new curesets
Script.script: ar.install.deletePriorSettings = function(event) if ar.install.installed == false then if event == "ar.gotCuresets" then if table.is_empty(ar.curesetList) == false then for _, v in pairs(ar.curesetList) do send("cureset delete " .. v .. " confirm") end end ar.curesetList = nil ar.install.curesetInstall() end if event == "ar.gotTreeScenarios" and table.is_empty(ar.treeScenarios) == false then for _, v in pairs(ar.treeScenarios) do send("curing tree scenario delete " .. v .. " confirm") end ar.treeScenarios = nil ar.install.treeScenarios() end raiseEvent("ar.install.deletedPriorSettings") end end registerAnonymousEventHandler("ar.gotCuresets", "ar.install.deletePriorSettings") registerAnonymousEventHandler("ar.gotTreeScenarios", "ar.install.deletePriorSettings")

Script.name: tree scenarios
Script.script: ar.install.treeScenarios = function() local t = { momentum = {affcount = {3}}, antiscythe = {afflictions = {"impatience"}, affcount = {2}}, occultist = {affcount = {3}, afflictions = {"whisperingmadness"}}, venomlock = {afflictions = {"asthma", "slickness", "anorexia", "impatience"}}, normal = {affcount = {2}}, } for k, _ in pairs(t) do send("curing tree scenario new " .. k) for x, _ in pairs(t[k]) do send("curing tree scenario " .. x .. " "..k.." " .. table.concat(t[k][x], " ")) end end raiseEvent("ar.install.treeScenarioInstall") end

Script.name: cureset install
Script.script: ar.install.curesetInstall = function() local t = {"duel", "group", "hunting", "burst", "aeon", "custom"} local tempString = "curing priority" for _, v in pairs(t) do for aff, prio in pairs(ar.install.curesetBase.affs) do tempString = tempString .. " " .. aff .. " " .. prio end send("cureset new " .. v) send(tempString) send("curing priority defence list reset") tempString = "curing priority" for _, x in pairs(ar.classList) do ars.curesets[x] = ars.curesets[x] or {} ars.curesets[x][v] = table.deepcopy(ar.install.curesetBase) end end raiseEvent("ar.install.curesetInstall") end

Script.name: curing options
Script.script: ar.install.curesetBase = { affs = { tonguetied = 3, grievouswounds = 25, cremated = 20, palpatarfeed = 26, amnesia = 1, bloodfire = 4, cadmuscurse = 26, conflagration = 25, deepsleep = 3, enlightenment = 26, isolation = 26, mindclamp = 26, penitence = 26, weakenedmind = 26, parasite = 12, epilepsy = 13, weariness = 12, pressure = 12, dizziness = 17, shadowmadness = 13, guilt = 8, haemophilia = 13, temperedsanguine = 16, dissonance = 13, masochism = 17, clumsiness = 12, darkshade = 13, stupidity = 17, healthleech = 12, agoraphobia = 17, tenderskin = 8, claustrophobia = 17, indifference = 13, generosity = 13, confusion = 13, vertigo = 17, recklessness = 9, paralysis = 3, unweavingbody = 7, retribution = 17, justice = 17, timeloop = 17, peace = 17, depression = 13, nausea = 13, addiction = 13, temperedmelancholic = 15, spiritburn = 8, lethargy = 13, lovers = 17, shyness = 17, sensitivity = 14, paranoia = 17, scytherus = 15, pacified = 17, unweavingmind = 7, dementia = 17, hypersomnia = 17, loneliness = 17, temperedphlegmatic = 16, impatience = 5, hypochondria = 6, hallucinations = 15, temperedcholeric = 16, asthma = 4, manaleech = 11, disloyalty = 11, aeon = 2, whisperingmadness = 23, slickness = 5, unweavingspirit = 15, tension = 11, deadening = 11, hellsight = 3, dazed = 12, mangledhead = 22, calcifiedskull = 22, selarnia = 25, mangledrightarm = 20, shivering = 25, laceratedthroat = 25, burning = 25, skullfractures = 11, concussion = 15, mangledleftleg = 12, brokenleftarm = 16, torntendons = 12, mangledrightleg = 12, heartseed = 6, serioustrauma = 6, brokenrightleg = 14, stuttering = 25, damagedrightleg = 11, dazzled = 25, wristfractures = 13, scalded = 26, frozen = 25, brokenrightarm = 16, slashedthroat = 24, damagedleftleg = 11, damagedrightarm = 15, anorexia = 4, damagedleftarm = 15, hypothermia = 13, itching = 10, crackedribs = 14, damagedhead = 15, mangledleftarm = 20, calcifiedtorso = 22, crushedthroat = 12, mildtrauma = 9, brokenleftleg = 14, coldfate = 26, petrified = 26, fear = 20, internalbleeding = 26, degenerate = 26, silver = 26, blackout = 25, webbed = 6, solarburn = 26, demonstain = 26, lapsingconsciousness = 26, bound = 6, airfisted = 26, flamefisted = 26, unconsciousness = 26, enmesh = 26, numbedleftarm = 26, hindered = 26, icefisted = 26, transfixation = 6, sleeping = 2, blistered = 26, bruisedribs = 26, hecatecurse = 26, latched = 3, vinewreathed = 26, corruption = 26, numbedrightarm = 26, entangled = 6, asphyxiating = 26, lightbind = 26, mindravaged = 26, waterbonds = 26, trueblind = 26, silenced = 26, hatred = 26, deteriorate = 26, entropy = 26, scrambledbrains = 26, revealed = 26, timeflux = 26, dehydrated = 26, homunculusmercury = 26, kaisurge = 26, pinshot = 26, disrupted = 9, slimeobscure = 26, insomnia = 26, vitrified = 26, phlogisticated = 26, voidfisted = 26, vitiated = 26, deafness = 26, hamstrung = 26, inquisition = 26, blindness = 26, prone = 9, impaled = 6, kkractlebrand = 25, daeggerimpale = 6, voyria = 9, muddled = 26, }, defup = {}, keepup = {}, options = { ["curing"] = "on", ["curing afflictions"] = "on", ["curing defenses"] = "on", ["curing sipping"] = "on", ["curing transmutation"] = "on", ["curing fallback"] = "on", ["curing siphealth"] = 82, ["curing sipmana"] = 82, ["curing mosshealth"] = 75, ["curing mossmana"] = 75, ["curing priority"] = "health", ["curing focus"] = "on", ["curing focusing"] = "first", ["curing tree"] = "on", ["curing insomnia"] = "on", ["curing mount"] = "clear", ["curing usevault"] = "on", ["curing useclot"] = "on", ["curing clotat"] = "1000", ["curing manathreshold"] = 70, ["curing batch"] = "on", ["curing healthaffsabove"] = 70, ["curing clothealth"] = 70, }, }

Script.name: run installation
Script.script: ar.install.runInstall = function(event) if event == "ar.install.startInstall" then ar.skills.iHave() send("config advancedcuring on") send("config commandseparator |") send("config killwarning on") send("config screenwidth 0") send("config UniversalAfflictionMessages off") send("config ShowQueueAlerts on") send("class list") send("cureset list") send("curing tree scenario list") end if event == "ar.install.deletedPriorSettings" then ar.install.progress.deletepriorsettings = true end if event == "ar.install.treeScenarioInstall" then ar.install.progress.treescenarios = true end if event == "ar.install.curesetInstall" then ar.install.progress.curesets = true table.save(ars.file .. "/curesets", ars.curesets) end if ar.install.progress.deletepriorsettings == true and ar.install.progress.treescenarios == true and ar.install.progress.curesets == true then ar.install.installed = true disableTrigger("ar installation - DO NOT UNLOCK") table.save(ar.file .. "/installation/installTable", ar.install) if ar.install.progress.installedEcho == false then tempTimer( 2, [[cecho("<white> AR INSTALLED! Thank you for your time, ]] .. gmcp.Char.Name.name .. [[")]], false ) ar.install.progress.installedEcho = true end end end registerAnonymousEventHandler("ar.install.startInstall", "ar.install.runInstall") registerAnonymousEventHandler("ar.install.deletedPriorSettings", "ar.install.runInstall") registerAnonymousEventHandler("ar.install.treeScenarioInstall", "ar.install.runInstall") registerAnonymousEventHandler("ar.install.curesetInstall", "ar.install.runInstall")
